summary: AHO - Aetherium Hyperspace Observatory - is a large mobile player house, in Dwemer style. It is a stand-alone player home, part of our big DLC - Project AHO
descriptionHtml:
[size=3]AHO - Aetherium Hyperspace Observatory - is a large mobile player house, in Dwemer style. It is a stand-alone player home, part of our big DLC - [url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/90276]Project AHO[/url] (available Bethesda.net, Steam and Nexus for PC and XBox One)

[url=https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects][size=2][img]http://tesall.ru/uploads/imgs/pre_1535556014__11111.png[/img][/size][size=5]﻿[b]Support Haem Projects on Patreon![/b][/size][/url]﻿

[center]﻿[b]﻿[ATTENTION! DO NOT USE THIS MODE WITHIN "PROJECT AHO"][/b][/center]
In order to enter the ship, you need to use a "Control Cube" which is located near "Deep Folk Crossing" (North-western Skyrim). Used to summon the ship. The cube can be found on the top of the Dwemer building near the landing platform.

[b]Features:[/b]
- The ability to move between 6 dwarven ruins (Deep Folk Crossing, Alftand, Nchardak, Avanchnzel, Tower of Mzark, Reachwind Eyrie). Use it whenever you want!
- Fully customizable lighting and effects!
- All crafting stations (Dwemer stylized), common containers and bookshelves!
- Many-Faced's Tool: A special feature allowing you to customize your character’s appearance!
- Drink Factory, thematic containers, Dwarven sauna and more!

[center][youtube]hTmlNyJSfK0[/youtube][/center]

[b]Uninstall: [/b]
Before uninstalling mod empty all containers, drop cube from your inventory and exit interior cell. 

[b]Created by: [/b]
Haem Projects (Dimonoider & gkalian)

[b]Contact Us:[/b]
haemprojects@gmail.com

[b]Support us!
Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/haemprojects
PayPal: haemprojects@gmail.com[/b]
